displayName.japanese: 使えるモノは使わなくちゃね！

description.english: Use a Download Chip for the first time.
description.japanese: 配信チップ機能を初めて利用した
description.tchinese: 初次使用通訊晶片功能
description.schinese: 初次使用通信芯片功能

displayName.japanese: お気に入りは見つかった？

description.english: Use the Music Player to listen to one or more songs from each game.

description.tchinese: 在音樂鑑賞裡每個系列都至少播放一首歌曲

description.english: Complete Mega Man Battle Network 1, 2, and 3.

description.tchinese: 完成 ROCKMAN EXE 1、2、3

description.english: Take part in more than 100 battles.

description.tchinese: 戰鬥次數總共達到 100 次以上

displayName.japanese: ヘビーネットサーファー

displayName.english: Thank You for Your Patronage! Huh!

description.english: Use the chip trader 30 times.
